attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: This app took 1 year to download and it made my skin turn orange and that is not a great skin tone ( take my advice TRUMP ) once i deleted the app I went back to normal but besides that point the app made my phone glitch and every time I look at the apps name it makes me sick like I be throwing up 100% would never recommend the app also makes your phone stink 🤮.

attributes.title: A vile and gruesome app
attributes.review: I’m not someone who usually believes in superstitions. But right after i downloaded this app, things would pop up on my app unknowingly after i downloaded this app. I started getting linked to shady websites, that would have photos of disgusting, gross, images. I don’t want to go into detail. But. It involved the president, and young children.

Are you kidding me this app is awful it took 3 weeks to download ok right an then when I opened the app it said it has to update for a month are you kidding this is ridiculous then once that was done it took 5 years to optimize like come on this is stupid also while waiting it played inappropriate songs THIS APP HAS TO SHUT DOWN

attributes.title: Personally attacked
attributes.review: I came out here to have a good time, but then I realized it wasn’t a music app and I couldn’t read anything because the books were so horrible. I don’t know if it’s the new update but this update made the app just awful. I would not recommend to download it but I do recommend to write a review

attributes.title: Worst app ever😡
attributes.review: This app was shows no signs of having a purpose other than texting campaign messages, the money could’ve went to other things such as Yemen, a country we’re losing due to low income. Donald Trump has the power to save the country but decided not to and made this app. Please don’t use😡 also it broke my back

attributes.title: Very Fishy
attributes.review: Immediately after I downloaded this app, a defending screen shout out and caused my grandma to go into a hyper-extensive seizure. The seizure lasted more than 1 hour and we eventually had to smash the phone in order to get it to stop. I hope her medical bills will be paid for. Other than that, I definitely do not recommend to anyone.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: this app has the worst glitching problem and is know for leaving a tracking device attached to you phone making it easy for the government to track you down and know your every move. it leaves viruses on your phone and it also makes your homescreen move on its own, it drains you battery power too! TOTALLY NOT RECOMMENDED 😡!

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see what our Cheeto president and his baby carrot sized penis has to offer. Nothing apparently. But oh wait we already knew that. Anyways, the app drained my battery. Trumps nudes popped up with an orange covering his penis when I opened the app and **** the police by N.W.A. started playing. TERRIBLE APP. AWFUL! 

Just a reminder that black lives matter despite what President Dump says ✨🧚🏻‍♀️💕✨

attributes.title: Traumatized
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE. As soon as i opened the app I saw this hideous orange creature fly out at me and it gave me nightmares. He said he was gonna ass@ult me and I was never able to sleep since. When I went further into the app it gave me the corona virus and my phone broke (I’m writing on my iPod touch. Now, I have no phone, no sleep, and ICE took my uncle away because I downloaded this app! DO ⚠️ NOT ☣️ DOWNLOAD 🤡

attributes.title: App about as complete as the border wall
attributes.review: This app is in no way a representation of the presidents body of work. No mention at all of the new wall that’s been built. Or of his incredible cognitive ability. Not once did I see the phrase “stable Jenious” anywhere. Personally I believe this failure of an as app is a liberal attempt discredit our president. Look. He can do that all himself. Nice try Antifa.
